name: Garlic Chicken Stir-Fry
instructions: Cook chicken with garlic and onion. Add carrots and soy sauce. Stir-fry until cooked through.

name: Tofu Veggie Bowl
instructions: Grill tofu and sauté vegetables. Combine with rice and soy sauce in a bowl.

name: Beef and Broccoli
instructions: Cook beef with garlic and onion. Add broccoli and soy sauce. Serve with rice.

name: Spaghetti with Tomato Basil Sauce
instructions: Cook pasta. In another pan, sauté garlic in olive oil, add tomatoes, and season with basil, salt, and pepper. Combine with pasta.

name: Cheddar Scrambled Eggs
instructions: Beat eggs with milk and seasoning. Cook in buttered pan, stirring in cheddar cheese until fluffy.

name: Pork Stir-Fry with Bell Pepper
instructions: Sauté pork with garlic and ginger. Add onions and bell pepper, stir in soy sauce and cook until done.

name: Tofu Spinach Curry
instructions: Cook onion and garlic, add spices, then tofu and spinach. Simmer until tender.

name: Vegetable Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs with milk, season, add vegetables and cheese. Cook in pan until set.

name: Honey Lemon Yogurt Parfait
instructions: Mix yogurt with lemon juice and honey. Chill and serve.

name: Broccoli Cheddar Soup
instructions: Make roux with butter and flour, add milk, broccoli, onion, and cheddar. Cook until thick.
